channel.title: Saru's Classes - BD Offensive and Converts
channel.description:
You know the drill.
> # [color = "steblue"] The Druid [/color] > **[color = "steblue"] Blue Dragon Offensive [/color]** **Isolation (Passive)** - Grants the Druid immunity to occupation at night and to target changing. **Wall of Thorns (Day)** - For the following night prevents Unseen-aligned and Cult-aligned classes from visiting the Druid and will respectively either Poison or Bleed them depending on their faction. The Bleeding and Poison will kill them if they are not healed the next night. - 2 uses **Glyph of Decay (Day)** - Selects a player and all healing and removal of Poison and Bleeding on them will fail for the next two nights. - 3 uses **Glyph of Lethargy (Night)** - Your target player’s target will be immune to your targets action. Your target will see their target as Blue Dragon and won’t see visits. - Infinite uses *Defeat the Unseen or Cult and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* Magic User
Converts to > # [color = "purple"] The Forest Witch [/color] > **[color = "purple"] Unseen Offensive [/color]** **Isolation (Passive)** - Grants the Forest Witch immunity to occupation at night and to target changing. **Nightshade Curse (Day)** - Selects a player and for the next two nights they will not be able to be healed. - 2 uses **Wall of Roots (Day)** - Causes all visits on the target to be prevented the following night. - 1 use **Curse of Lethargy (Night)** - Your target player’s target will be immune to your targets action. Your target will see their target as Blue Dragon and won’t see visits. - Infinite uses *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* Magic User
----
> # [color = "steblue"] The Sentinel [/color] > **[color = "steblue"] Blue Dragon Offensive [/color]** **Alertness (Day)** - The Sentinel will be immune to occupation and to target changing the coming night. - 3 uses **Detainment (Night)** - Silently removes all of the passives and night immunity from the Sentinel’s target. The Detainment will also last until the end of the next night except when it comes to removing Royal Blood, which lasts two days. - Infinite uses **Curfew (Night)** - The Sentinel occupies their target if they attempts to attack or convert a player. - 2 uses *Defeat the Unseen or Cult and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
Converts To: > # [color = "purple"] The Warden [/color] > **[color = "purple"] Unseen Offensive [/color]** **Alert (Passive)** - Grants the Warden immunity to occupation at night and to target changing. **Parole (Day)** - Prevents the target player from using any day abilities. - 3 uses **Detainment (Night)** - Silently removes all of the passives and night immunity from the Warden’s target. The Detainment will also last until the end of the next night except when it comes to removing Royal Blood, which lasts two days. - Infinite uses **Off-Limits (Night)** - The Warden puts a barrier around their Mastermind or Assassin, causing the next Blue Dragon-align investigative role to automatically be prevented if they try to visit them. The Warden will be informed when the barrier actives. - 2 uses *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*

item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Speaking of NKs, I’ve been wondering the potential for these 2 classes to be NK fake-claims. Both of these classes have quite situational confirming capabilities, both show as Killer/Offensive, one is occ immune and MU while the other one has basically toggle-able occupation immunity and can work if a Butler found you regardless if you’re a Poss or a Reaper. I’d imagine that they’d work better than a Knight claim.

item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Alice:

Detainment (Night) - Silently removes all of the passives and night immunity from the Sentinel’s target. The Detainment will also last until the next day except when it comes to removing Royal Blood, which lasts two days. - Infinite uses

I would make the effect simply last until the end of the next night because…

Alice:

Curfew (Night) - The Sentinel occupies their target if they attempts to attack or convert a player. Bypasses occupy immunity. - 2 uses

Make this not bypass occupy immunity. If you want to stop someone who is immune then detain them first

Making ability synergies can lead to a more interesting class.

item.title: Saru's Classes - BD Offensive and Converts
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Alice:

Curse of Lethargy (Night) - If the Forest Witch’s target is attacking this night, then their target will be immune from that attack. If the Forest Witch’s target is occupying or redirecting this night then their targets will be immune to their occupation or redirection. If the Forest Witch’s target is converting this night then the conversion will fail. If the Forest Witch’s target is conducting a faction check then their target will show up as a member of the Blue Dragon as their result, and if their target is an Actuary or Observer then they will receive either zero or no visits as their results. - Infinite uses

Simple way to reword this:

Target player’s target will be immune to your targets action. Your target will see their target as Blue Dragon and won’t see visits. (Unlimited)

Nightshade Curse (Day) - Selects a player and for the next two nights they will not be able to be healed. - 3 uses
